title: WTB Large lot of low grade T206's..
author: Blunder19

posts.post_title: WTB Large lot of low grade T206's..
posts.post_content:
Hello,

I am looking to buy anywhere from 25-100 t206 cards.. poor shape is prefered so I can afford them. But not looking for cards with huge amounts of paper loss or cards where parts of the card is missing....Also ungraded... please let me knonw if you have any group of t206s that you can part with. I can be reached at [url]blunder19@aol.com[/url]

Thanks
Jamie

Jamie, 

Are you starting up again? I thought you already did this. 

:D

Hey Jim,

Yes.. I put together the set .. a lot of hard work...but only got to enjoy it for several months before I was forced to sell due to house problems......now I have some $$ again so I would like to go at it again.. I loved having them ...even in bad condition.... I would like to enjoy them for longer this time around.

[quote name="Blunder19" post=764359]Hey Jim,

Yes.. I put together the set .. a lot of hard work...but only got to enjoy it for several months before I was forced to sell due to house problems......now I have some $$ again so I would like to go at it again.. I loved having them ...even in bad condition.... I would like to enjoy them for longer this time around.[/QUOTE]

I remember. New roof, wasn't it? Good luck again!

Yes You have a good Memory! The roof is great.. no more leaks.. but my collection is gone.. I really miss the elberfeld wash port with his name on the top instead of bottom... At least I got to keep the cy young with mis cut back.. I bought a 2nd one to put in with the set so I could keep this one.. its my favorite card..
